website_summaries.verdict: Because of the lack of reviews, not much can be said about the Nike Air Darwin’s on-court performance. A reviewer did comment that these retro high-top basketball shoes seem to be too heavy and bulky to play ball in. Still, it appears that these retro Nike basketball shoes are for old sneakerheads who love the distinct look of 90’s sneakers. Dennis Rodman fans who have been patiently waiting for a legit reissue of the Nike Air Darwin should definitely grab a pair of these basketball shoes.
pros: A reviewer likes how these retro Nike basketball shoes fit
The Nike Air Darwin Retro runs true to size, a wearer declares
Several are quick to comment that these Nike basketball shoes look dope, pretty much like the celebrated KD 11
The Nike Air Darwin has a Max Air unit that provides a cushioned ride
These Dennis Rodman sneakers feature a speed lacing system to help wearers lace up quickly
cons: Some are dissing the Nike Air Darwin’s appearance
To them, these look like children’s shoes
A reviewer claims that this shoe is too heavy and bulky for basketball
These Dennis Rodman shoes for sale have a limited number of colorways to choose from

customer_reviews.title: The best sneakers. Very stylish.
customer_reviews.text: These are the absolute best shoes. I get compliments all the time. The white sole and black cloth look is the current modern fresh look. What I will say is that when I tried other Nike shoes that look like this style, they did not have the same cushioning or comfort. I will say that I’ve bought about seven pairs of these so I can definitely say that I recommend them. I do a lot of athletic classes and the first time I put them on I was like, wow this give me an advantage. They look great and are very comfortable comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: JonathanSD

customer_reviews.title: Great Sneaker
customer_reviews.text: Great Great Great sneaker. I buy a lot of flynit and mesh type nike sneakers and these are top noch. Peoples reviews are correct that it is tight at the top of the sneaker, you have to put effort to put your foot in. But once it loosens up after a couple days its fine. I wouldnt recommend a bigger size unless you have a wide foot because they will break in. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: cp328

customer_reviews.title: Good looking and fitting shoe
customer_reviews.text: Shoes run a bit small. I am a 9.5 in reg dress shoes but ordered the 10 and are perfect. They are tough to pull on first cple times but loosen up. V comfortable and look good.
customer_reviews.author: jim finan

customer_reviews.title: Amazing shoes
customer_reviews.text: They are a little narrow in the middle of my foot but I expected it because I don't have much of an arch. Not at all uncomfortable, they are actually the best shoes I have ever worn. At first I thought that they were black and was a little disappointed when I opened the box, but honestly I love the color now. They are perfect work shoes
customer_reviews.author: christina

customer_reviews.title: Stain on white soles from ink?
customer_reviews.text: These shoes seem like good made shoes but both had a stain on sides of shoe like the color faded into the white soles. Would have asked for another pair if we had been in a store purchasing but decided to just keep them so we didn’t have to wait for the return process. Not too noticeable but would have wished the soles were all white.
customer_reviews.author: Khristy H.

customer_reviews.title: ... got them on found that they are a very comfortable shoe.
customer_reviews.text: They were very tight to put on but after I got them on found that they are a very comfortable shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Justin Smith

customer_reviews.title: They are very comfortable even after hours of walking on asphalt
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my son who works at an amusement park. They are very comfortable even after hours of walking on asphalt.
customer_reviews.author: Kfred

customer_reviews.title: The best there is
customer_reviews.text: Nike quality. The best there is. Need to say more?
customer_reviews.author: Super-Duper Kiss

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable. Light.
customer_reviews.text: Only Worn them a couple days so far, but I CAN say these shoes are extremely comfortable. They practically weigh nothing and the soles feel like you're walking on foam.
customer_reviews.author: Kristy Fly

customer_reviews.title: My white Nike’s came with yellow staining
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had a couple pairs of these type of shoes , I’ve always second guessed getting a pair of white ones for a really long time and I finally decided and did not expect to get them with yellow staining all around. Not happy about it at all.
customer_reviews.author: Angel

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight and the design looks great, only downside is that the width is slightly ...
customer_reviews.text: Lightweight and the design looks great, only downside is that the width is slightly narrow producing a tight, snug fit.
customer_reviews.author: Francis Lacson

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Not a cold weather shoe. Let's allot of air come threw the shoe.

customer_reviews.title: Most comfortable shoe he’s ever worn
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my son. Most comfortable shoe he’s ever worn. He love them

customer_reviews.title: Love this shoe
customer_reviews.text: Love this shoe, way lighter than my last pair of shoes, and seems to be much lighter. Would buy again I would buy them for my son!! Nice product.

customer_reviews.title: I think i pick a great pair because he loves them
customer_reviews.text: brought these for my 16 year old son, I think i pick a great pair because he loves them, be mindful they do run a little on the wide size other than that great shoe.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe! Very comfortable, would highly recommended and wull definitely be buying again!

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Shoes are great, just a little narrow. Nice shoe though.

customer_reviews.text: I have wide feet but it needs a couple uses then it fits like a glove . But yes did seem somewhat snug

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Love them, made it easy for Dali g with airport TSA, slip on and off.

customer_reviews.text: Good shoe and price. The all white is very stylish.

customer_reviews.title: better options are out there
customer_reviews.text: Color was off and had a stain. If you are looking for an all white, better options are out there.

customer_reviews.title: and they suck.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a half size bigger and it still is tight. I normally wear a 10 d regular. and they suck.

customer_reviews.title: WIDTH
customer_reviews.text: Fit somewhat small according to width but overall a great shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Jason O.

customer_reviews.title: Runs small and narrow
customer_reviews.text: Likes the style of shoe, however I found that it runs pretty small. I wear a size 12 normally and ordered as such, however the shoe was both narrow and smaller than I expected. I returned the shoe and will be looking to get a half size or size bigger.
customer_reviews.author: David P.

customer_reviews.title: Great Shoes
customer_reviews.text: I ordered it for my teenage son, and he loves it. He wears it to the school everyday.
customer_reviews.author: E. Littles

customer_reviews.title: After 3 months its threads are coming off and color is shading poor quality. my suggestion to all of them dont ...
customer_reviews.text: I think it's not genuine nike product. After 3 months its threads are coming off and color is shading poor quality .my suggestion to all of them dont but it. buy in a store even if it is double expensive ..
customer_reviews.author: suresh

customer_reviews.title: Least comfortable Nike shoes I have ever owned and I have only worn Nike shoes my entire life.
customer_reviews.text: Stylish but the least comfortable Nike shoes I have ever owned. The elastic lacing that "wraps" around the shoe makes the shoe uncomfortable. The loose ends of the lacing move freely (they are not bound) beneath the thin insole that is provided. Sometimes you can feel them against your toes under the insoles.
customer_reviews.author: brownz

customer_reviews.title: Nice snickers, thanks the delivery was super faster 👍
customer_reviews.text: Nice snickers , thanks the delivery was super faster 👍

product_meta.title: Nike Men's Darwin Sneaker
product_meta.description: Nike Darwin that is inspired by nike roshe and nike soon, offers maximum comfort. It is made with a glossy mesh, flexible integrated flywire cables for superior dynamic comfort. An injected unit provides a smooth ride with the rubber pods for pulling.
